column1: Regular traffic reports will resume Wednesday September 30 at 4:00 p.m.

column4: All inbound lanes shutdown at Aristides Blvd due to an injury collision at Sugar Maple Ln involving a truck with a camper and a semi.
The outbound left lane is also blocked between Citation Blvd and Sugar Maple Ln.
Update 10:32 a.m. - Access to inbound Newtown Pike from I-75 is now shutdown.
